author: dildick
body:
Previous attempt (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13364) had changes in both Run2 and Phase2 scenarios. This PR enables the local integrated triggers only for the Phase2 and Phase2_dev scenarios. It should not interfere with Run2_25ns. To be integrated after https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13963.

Remaining issues in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13364 (see below) will be addressed in another PR.
- isSLHC should be False for Run2_25ns
- addition of a "muonTrigger2017" scenario for high PU running (with isSLHC set to True), i.e. Run2_2017, Run2_2017_trackingPhase1PU70 and Run2_2017_trackingRun2
title: Era customizations for the GEM-CSC and CSC-RPC local integrated triggers for Phase2
